constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

decision_conditions: The deposited plans in support of the details application show changes to the approved front boundary treatment under planning permission 21/01585/FUL and the plans as such would conflict with the plans approved under planning permission 21/01585/FUL.

The applicant has not provided sufficient detail to determine whether the proposed waste and recycling details would satisfy the requirements of Condition 14 of the planning permission which is to ensure proper waste management in the interests of the character and appearance of the area and the living conditions of neighbouring occupiers, in accordance with policy SI17 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

The proliferation of cycle lockers proposed across the site would create visual clutter and detract from the character and appearance of the host property and the surrounding area and fail to preserve the character and appearance of the Oakhill Conservation Area causing less than substantial harm to the designated heritage asset. The proposal would not accord with paragraphs 195 - 214 of the NPPF 2021,  policies CS6, CS8, DM8, DM10 and DM12 of the Council's adopted LDF Core Strategy.

The proposed cycle parking is insufficient as it provides fewer cycle parking spaces than the required 11 residents and 2 visitors cycle parking spaces required by policy T5 of the London Plan and therefore the proposed development would not accord with Policy T5 of the London Plan 2021.
description: Details required for Condition 11 (Bio-Diversity), Condition 13 (Hard and Soft Landscaping), Condition 14 (Waste and Recycle Facility) and Condition 15 (Cycle Parking) of planning permission 21/01585/FUL (Erection of new 3 storey building with basement containing 7no. self-contained residential units with ancillary cycle store and refuse/recycling store (following demolition of existing dwellinghouse)
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
